data.text:
Solution

Verified by Toppr

Bill Gates was born in Seattle, Washington, to William H.Gates and Mary Maxwell Gates on October 28, 1955, in Washington, USA. He went to Harvard to study but dropped out in 1975. He is the non-executive Chairman of Microsoft with a net worth of US$53 billion. He is married to Malinda Gates and has three children.
